name: NEAR WAR BULLET ALPHA
description:
Abda on instgram

NEAR WAR BULLET is a FPS multiplayer game include a team death mach and free for all mood and support 4x4 palyers There are two versions now  for Windows and Android.

System Requirements for pc

OS: Windows 7 SP1+

Graphics card with DX10 

Processor:  Intel Core i2

 Memory:  4 GB RAM

 Storage:  6 GB available space
